if you guet errors running the game at visata or Windows 7:

You have to install manually the physx & direct x drivers on de game directory

DirectXRedist: 
PhysX:
Both at the root of the installation directory.

So... Install game, install DX, install Physx, patch with crack folder content at binaires directory, run the game !
